sentence.Network_en: He warned the public to be vigilant and report anything suspicious.
sentence.Network_cn: 他警告公众要提高警惕，遇到任何可疑情况都要报告。

sentence.Network_en: A pilot must remain vigilant at all times.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞行员必须随时保持警惕。

sentence.Network_en: He has to learn how to remain vigilant through these long nights.
sentence.Network_cn: 他得学会如何在这漫长的黑夜里保持警觉.

n.1. [男子名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 凯西。盖尔语姓氏的英语形式，来源于别名，含义是“警惕的”(vigilant) 2. [女子名] 凯西。，，等的昵称Casey的用法例句

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin vigilant- 'keeping awake', from the verb vigilare, from vigil (see vigil)

entry.def: Someone who is vigilant gives careful attention to a particular problem or situation and concentrates on noticing any danger or trouble that there might be.

example.ex: He warned the public to be vigilant and report anything suspicious...
example.tran: 他警告公众要提高警惕，遇到任何可疑情况都要报告。

example.ex: All but one of these letter bombs had been intercepted by vigilant post office staff.
example.tran: 除了一封漏网之外，警惕的邮局员工截获了其余所有的邮件炸弹。

means.word_mean: 1. carefully observant or attentive; on the lookout for possible danger;

sentences.sentence: "the vigilant eye of the town watch"
"there was a watchful dignity in the room"
"a watchful parent with a toddler in tow"

stems_affixes.word_buile: vigil=vig生命+ant……的→有生命的→警惕的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 朝气蓬勃的,精力旺盛的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vigor[n.活动,精力,元气]+ous表形容词→adj.朝气蓬勃的,精力旺盛的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 警戒, 警惕, 失眠症, 警惕性
stems_affixes.word_buile: vigil=vig生命+ance表名词→有生命→警惕
vig生命+or表名词→n.活动,精力,元气
